overview: Nora is a 56-year-old woman who is trapped in the routine inside her small apartment in the city of Bogot√°. Exhausted with her working life, her past plunges her into madness, causing Nora to hallucinate with her husband whom she murdered a few years ago. Unable to overcome such an event at the end of the night, she finds a bridge through which she will escape the monotony and meet again with her late husband.
title: Al Final de la Noche
